ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Generates a simple Ternary Polygon Chart in code
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Generates a [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#The%20Ternary%20Polygon%20Type.html']Ternary Polygon chart[/url] in code. The TernaryPolygonRenderableSeries can be used to render an [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Model.DataSeries.XyzDataSeries%601.html']XyzDataSeries[/url].
Polygons are rendered using the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.RenderableSeries.BaseRenderableSeries~Stroke.html']Stroke[/url] (outline) and Fill (fill).
